jodd.madvoc.component

Class ActionsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.madvoc.component.ActionsManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProxettaAwareActionsManager

    public class ActionsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all Madvoc action and aliases registrations.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ActionsManager.ActionConfigSetComparator
      Comparator that considers first chunks number then action path.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllActionConfigurations

        public java.util.List<ActionConfig> getAllActionConfigurations()
        Returns all registered action configurations. Returned list is a join of action paths with and without the macro.

      • getActionsCount

        public int getActionsCount()
        Returns total number of registered actions.

      • isAsyncModeOn

        public boolean isAsyncModeOn()
        Returns true if at least one action has async mode turned on.

        Resolves action method for given action class ane method name.

      • registerAction

        protected ActionConfig registerAction(java.lang.Class actionClass,
                                      java.lang.reflect.Method actionMethod,
                                      ActionDef actionDef)
        Registration main point. Does two things:
        • parse action and creates ActionConfig
        • registers created ActionConfig
        Returns created ActionConfig.
        See Also:
        registerAction(jodd.madvoc.ActionConfig)

      • registerAction

        public ActionConfig registerAction(ActionConfig actionConfig)
        Registers manually created action configurations. Optionally, if action path with the same name already exist, exception will be thrown.

      • createActionConfigSet

        protected ActionConfigSet createActionConfigSet(java.lang.String actionPath)
        Creates new action config set from the action path.

      • lookup

        public ActionConfig lookup(java.lang.String actionPath,
                           java.lang.String method)
        Returns action configurations for provided action path. First it lookups for exact actionPath. If action path is not registered, it is split into chunks and match against macros. Returns null if action path is not registered. method must be in uppercase.

      • lookup

        public ActionConfig lookup(java.lang.String actionString)
        Lookups action config for given action class and method string (aka 'action string'). The action string has the following format: className#methodName.
        See Also:
        ActionConfig.getActionString()

      • registerPathAlias

        public void registerPathAlias(java.lang.String alias,
                              java.lang.String path)
        Registers new path alias.

      • lookupPathAlias

        public java.lang.String lookupPathAlias(java.lang.String alias)
        Returns path alias.
